reviews.name: Jordache Women's Pull-On Denim Jegging
reviews.reviewText:
These are my first jeggings--and i absolutely love them. I wear leggings with a tunic or anything that covers my butt b/c I don't like to put it all out there. These jeggings are well constructed and very stylish. I wasn't sure what I was going to end up with at this super low price, but that's why I was giving these a try. Success! My girlfriends thought they were jeans they are so comfy. I just ordered 2 more pair in different colors.
Born in '75, I love that the horse is embroidered on the back pocket =)
reviews.title: Hidden Gem

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Pull-On Denim Jegging
reviews.reviewText: I love jegging's because they pull on with no zipper or button. They are so comfortable and easily stretch when you bent and or sit.
reviews.title: Love jeggings better than jeans!

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Pull-On Denim Jegging
reviews.reviewText: I just ordered 5 more pairs! I now own 10! I'm 45 and have gained some weight lately especially around my middle. When I wear button jeans or pants, I have a major muffin top that pushes out through my shirts! With these, this doesn't happen. They are so comfy and look like jeans or dress pants. I wear them to work and I'm a teacher! The price is so awesome!!!
reviews.title: I love these

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Pull-On Denim Jegging
reviews.reviewText: I like the jeans, my only complaint is that the waist band rolls and it gets uncomfortable later in the day. They are a little shorter than I would have liked, even though they do hit my ankle.
reviews.title: Good!

reviews.name: Jordache Women's Pull-On Denim Jegging
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely awesome, very comfortable, they hold in your tummy. The price is right, they wash up very nice. I will continue to buy more in the future.
reviews.title: I love my Jordache pull-on denim jeggings
